#### Dados climáticos (3 x 5 dias)

3 windows de 5 dias

```{r daily_weather_5dias}
# Base de dados bruta
daily_weather <- import("df_clima_diario_arg.csv")  %>% 
  mutate(window = (ID - 1) %/% 5 + 1)
```

# Media das variaveis por cada window

```{r daily_weather_5dias}
df_5days_mean <- daily_weather %>%
  group_by(LAT, LON, window, ratingdate) %>%
  summarize(across(starts_with(c("PRECTOTCORR", "RH2M", "T2M", "T2M_MAX","T2M_MIN", "T2M_RANGE", "WS2M")), mean, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  rename_with(.cols = c(PRECTOTCORR, RH2M, T2M, T2M_MAX, T2M_MIN, T2M_RANGE, WS2M),
              .fn = ~ paste0(., "_mean_win")) %>%
  select(LAT, LON, ratingdate, window, ends_with("_mean_win")) %>%   
  mutate(ratingdate = as.Date(ratingdate))  %>% 
   tidyr::pivot_wider(
    names_from = window,
    values_from = matches("_win")
  )
df_5days_mean %>% distinct(LAT,LON,ratingdate)
```


```{r daily_weather_5dias}
df_engvars_5days <- daily_weather %>%
    group_by(LAT, LON, window, ratingdate) %>%
   summarise(
     # Precipitacao
     QTD_DIAS_PRECIP_MAIOR_3MM_win = sum(PRECTOTCORR > 3, na.rm = TRUE),
     QTD_MM_ACUMUL_win = sum(PRECTOTCORR, na.rm = TRUE),
     # Umidade
     QTD_DIAS_UMIDREL_MAIOR_80_win = sum(RH2M > 80, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
    mutate(ratingdate = as.Date(ratingdate))  %>% 
  tidyr::pivot_wider(
    names_from = window,
    values_from = matches("_win")
  )
df_engvars_5days %>% distinct(LAT,LON,ratingdate)

```


```{r daily_weather_5dias}
# Juncao das medias e medianas obtidas
df_join_5days <- dis_data %>% 
  left_join(df_5days_mean, 
            by=c("LAT"="LAT","LON"="LON","ratingdate" = "ratingdate")) %>% 
  left_join(df_engvars_5days, 
            by=c("LAT"="LAT","LON"="LON","ratingdate" = "ratingdate"))   
  

df_join_5days %>% names
```
